ygData.subject: Time for a "/feedback" to tell Verant the lung/rebreather is too heavy.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Folks, I finally made it! After a long and depressing road I finally built up the skill needed to make the tinkered rebreathers. But, they are too dang
ygData.messageBody:
Well Folks,

I finally made it! After a long and depressing road I finally built up the skill needed to make the tinkered rebreathers. But, they are too dang heavy! At a cost of 3250 (price I'm trying to sell them for) peaple are reluctant to buy them since they weigh 10 stone.

Its time every gnome on the list here did a "/feedback" and tell Verant they need to reduce the weigh on them to 5 stone. We have had enough trouble making and selling them as it is.

Just do it, a quick 30 second note will go a long way.

Cheers,

FizzWizz of Tunare
